QuestData.Title: Mysterious Pod
QuestData.Description: This pod is similar to the ones growing on or near the bodies around here, except this one is pulsating weirdly.$b$bThis is something Khaano would be interested in.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Glowing Red Pod to Khaano at Crimson Fen in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: I've seen these around on corpses and the beasts, but not as big. Let me see it...
